about_the_game:
Save money on content for this game by purchasing the Year 1 Pass. Content can be downloaded from the store or in-game upon release.

Uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization and start exploring a subterranean world with the Year 1 Pass. Gain access to exciting exclusive content through 4 major DLC releases throughout the year, along with instant access to the Cotco Canyon truck. The Year 1 Pass includes 4 Seasons that will collectively include:

• Unique trucks and scout cars for venturing into the unknown
• New maps and areas to discover
• Over 120 new missions to accomplish
• New sets of specialists to hire for your team
• Exclusive high-tech tools for use in your expeditions
• New feature: Exploration of uncharted caves

This Year 1 Pass requires the base game Expeditions: A MudRunner game to run. The Year 1 Pass is also included in the Year 1 Edition and the Supreme Edition of Expeditions: A MudRunner game.
